name: Detect
summary: Discover or discern the existence, presence, or fact of an intrusion into information systems.

name: Deny
summary: Prevent disinformation creators from accessing and using critical information, systems, and services. Deny is for an indefinite time period.

name: Disrupt
summary: Completely break or interrupt the flow of information, for a fixed amount of time. (Deny, for a limited time period).  Not allowing any efficacy, for a short amount of time.

name: Degrade
summary: Reduce the effectiveness or efficiency of disinformation creators’ command and control or communications systems, and information collection efforts or means, either indefinitely, or for a limited time period.

name: Deceive
summary: Cause a person to believe what is not true. military deception seeks to mislead adversary decision makers by manipulating their perception of reality.

name: Destroy
summary: Damage a system or entity so badly that it cannot perform any function or be restored to a usable condition without being entirely rebuilt. Destroy is permanent, e.g. you can rebuild a website, but it’s not the same website.
